meanings.sent1: The foregoers of the new generation set a good example for others to follow.
meanings.sent2: The foregoers of the company paved the way for future success.
meanings.sent3: The foregoers of the family always arrive early for gatherings, earning the nickname 'Early Birds'.
meanings.sent4: In the history of inventions, the foregoers of modern technology were the pioneers who dared to dream big.
meanings.sent5: The foregoers of space exploration inspired generations to reach for the stars.

meanings.sent1: The runners will foregoers the cyclists in the race.
meanings.sent2: The announcement will foregoers the start of the event.
meanings.sent3: The smell of freshly baked cookies will foregoers the arrival of guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun will foregoers the awakening of the city.
meanings.sent5: The sound of thunder will foregoers the storm that follows.
